steps.title: Welcome Human
steps.content: I am Ed, I will take you explain the new age grading experience in Moodle - that's Edwiser RapidGrader

steps.title: Introduce the block section,
steps.content: Once you click on "Grade" or "Regrade" button you could move ahead to evaluate the quiz entries of your students.

steps.title: Hit on 'Grade' button to grade the questions,
